text:
25/11/2024 @ 11.54pm. went to this outlet to make a purchase, encounter a male staff who was rude.
I can understand that the staff who doesn't wish to greet any customer, it's fine with me. But does he need to show his displeasure while I'm trying to check out on my purchase. If the pos system can't process self-checkout payment, I don't think it's the customer's fault, right??? Would the cheers management think that it's right for customers to face such an attitude from your employees??? I believe your employees do wish to face unpleasant customers... Well at the end of the day, I asked your staff if I was rude toward him and why he felt that there was a need to be rude to others... and the best thing he did was keep quiet and didn't respond...

Dear cheers management, look into your training of your staff. If he is not the right fit, why keep him.

Each time I come here to purchase something the lady who is working in the morning shifts always made my day. The way she greets and talk to customers made people feel comfortable and welcome. The staff name is Serene Gan. Thanks you! CHEERS!
Please train your counter staff about the Life SG credits. The person who served me did not know about it and rude about it.
Staff Serene Gan is always polite and cheerful when she is on duty and greets me with a smile when I buy something! Excellent customer service! :)

Just visited the above, the staff is so helpful and polite,  the best Cheers I have ever visited.  Keep it up. üëç I bought  3 plants, she even helped me to arrange nicely so that it won't  tumble down. Difficult  to find  this type  of staff. Well done üëè
